```{r solution, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
ticker <- 'META'
first_date <- '2019-01-01'
last_date  <- '2023-01-01'

df_prices <- yfR::yf_get(
  tickers = ticker, 
  first_date = first_date, 
  last_date = last_date)

my_sol <- min(df_prices$price_close, 
              na.rm = TRUE)
```

Question
========

Using the `yfR` package, download daily data of the Facebook stock (FB) from _Yahoo Finance_ for the period between 2019 and 2023. What is the lowest **unadjusted closing price (column `price.close`)** in the analyzed period?

```{r solution, eval=FALSE}
```
